summary.description:
A Computational Theory for the Discretized Entorhinal Cortex.

Code accompanying the Transition-Scale Spaces paper.

The repository contains code that was used to generate data and figures for Waniek, Transition scale-spaces: A computational theory for the discretized entorhinal cortex, 2019.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'transition scale-space'
summary.name: Transition Scale-Spaces
